::Shadow Wing::

She flew fast. She found an updraft and rested a second gliding 
slowly trying to conserve her energy.  She had little left after 
manouvering throught the ice cannons.  She found a small tree growing 
on a hillside through the ice.  She stopped and perched for a 
moment.  She looked around for the Predacon, but didn't see it.  She 
hoped she had lost him.  The wind blew arond her.  She felt cold all 
of a sudden.  Not from the artict temperatures, but from inside.  She 
promised herself that if she made it through this, she would 
reprogramm herself into a better fighter.  She sighed and waited for 
her spark to calm down before flying off again. She kept looking for 
that pred on the horizon, but didn't see him. 

-----Orignal Message----
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine picks up the message from Perndabot, he scans the area 
for 
> the coordinates and swiftly moves toward them. He didn't know if 
the 
> Maximal was Shadow Wing or not under the circumstanaes he assumed 
it 
> was.
> 
> "Lunarpine to base, we have a Maximal in destress, I'm sending the 
> location now. Awaiting further orders."
> 
> To the Pit with orders, he thought as he sprinted across the 
> landscape in the direction of the Predicons message. A fellow 
Maximal 
> was in trouble, and there'd be Unicron to pay if it was harmed.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > I'll be out camping with family untill sunday, so I wouldn't be 
> able to post.

> > ::Zardus/DevilDuer/Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::
> > 
> > Zardus flies through the forest, looking around. He frowns. 
> Something was 
> > wrong, he could feel it. He looks down at his hand, seeing that 
it 
> was half 
> > transparent. No! It was happening again.
> > 
> > "I'll be gone for a few days," he says over his comm-link to the 
> Alliance, 
> > "Nemesis is in charge untill I get back."
> > 
> > He turns to Nemesis. "Finish the meeting with Panzertron. Try to 
> recruit him."
> > 
> > With that, Zardus phases out, ready to phase back in in several 
> days.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > In his quarters, DevilDuer turns around in his chair. He was not 
> feeling 
> > well. Stumbling across the room, he falls on his bed. With a 
flash, 
> DevilDuer 
> > is gone (for a few days).
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Perndabot spins around, looking at the sky. He could swear 
> something had just 
> > flown over him.
> > 
> > "Night vision," he tells his internal computer, his optics 
changing 
> color. He 
> > looks around, seeing a bird. That was it. Perndabot lifts his 
gun, 
> his optics 
> > widening when he looks at his arm, seeing through it. He growls. 
> Not again!
> > 
> > "There is a Maximal at my coordinates," he says over his comm-
link, 
> the 
> > device accidently transmitting that message over all frequences, 
> then sending 
> > the coordinates.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Reptilica and Bloodystrike drop off the energon they had mined in 
> the cargo 
> > hold. Reptilica smiles. "That's 200k of energon."
> > 
> > Bloodystrike growls. "I hate mining."
> > 
> > With a flash, the two dissapear.
